summary: This release adds a self-service domain checker, lets you change your username, and makes RSS feeds rate-limited by default. I also rebuilt all the command-line binaries for the latest Go changes and fixed a handful of bugs, like Stripe webhooks failing and a duplicate-key freeze in the dashboard.

features: add --token, --tag flags and .npmrc management to publish npm
add diff command, device presets, --wait-for, fix seed & install
add OnboardingAgent â€” DO-per-user email sequences
add onboarding subcommand for agent management
add screenshots to 22 help center articles
make blazes a real part of the grove (#1289)

add D1 migration tracking and gw d1 migrate-all
promote wisp_enabled to a proper graft
fixes: show visitor's own avatar instead of site owner's
pin playwright <1.51, fix classList null crash, improve browser discovery
remap historical paths for cohesive Living Grove timeline
render logo tree upright without background
make migration rollback real, surface --wait-for timeouts
repair inventory workflows, remove useless PR checks
drop logo tree, fix duplicate-key freeze
fix type check failures in validate-deployments workflow
populate default database/KV/R2 aliases in Go config
defer .name access until after DO construction
use Lexend font and fix unsubscribe link
correct R2 object path joining and add --remote flag
use build tags for Windows-compatible process management
remove stale svelte-ignore comments breaking CI
docs: add repository snapshot and release summary for v1.1.0
clean up stale packages/ path references across 31 files
